AlignmentSet.description: A data entity consisting of genomic intervals aligned to a reference.

data_format.description: Data/file format associated with a data entity.

has_reference.description: Specifies the reference coordinate system used by an omics dataset.

Assay.description: A coordinated set of actions designed to generate data from samples.

has_data.description: Data entity included in a given collection.

has_sample.description: Biological sample included or described by a given thing.

NamedThing.description: A generic grouping for any identifiable entity

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

NamedThing.title: NamedThing

ReferenceGenome.description: Reference assembly of a given genome, consisting of a collection of congiguous sequences (contigs).

has_sequence.description: Denotes that a sequence beolongs to a collection (e.g. a reference genome).

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

source_uri.description: The URI from which a resource was obtained.

taxon_id.description: The taxid number describing the taxonomic range of a sample.

ReferenceGenome.title: ReferenceGenome

ReferenceSequence.description: A contiguous sequence of DNA part of a reference coordinate system (genome assembly).

location.description: The uniform resource identifier to access a resource, either on the web or the filesystem

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sequence_md5.description: The pre-computed hash uniquely representing a biological sequence. Calculated as the MD5 of the upper-case sequence excluding all whitespace characters (this is equivalent to SQ:M5 in SAM).

source_uri.description: The URI from which a resource was obtained.

ReferenceSequence.title: ReferenceSequence

Sample.description: A biological sample used in assays. Examples include a whole organism, tissue or cell line.

collector.description: The organization responsible for collecting a given sample.

taxon_id.description: The taxid number describing the taxonomic range of a sample.

Sample.title: Sample

Study.description: Represents the digital object. It encapsulates omics and other datasets and their metadata.

completion_date.description: The date on which the concluding information for this study is completed.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

has_assay.description: An assay that was performed as part of a given thing.

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

start_date.description: The date on which this study began.
